content.title: Mukhyamantri Work Form Home-Job Work Yojana
content.details: Rajasthan government has launched 26-08-2022 a new scheme for women, the Mukhyamantri Work From–Job Work Scheme Under the Women and Child Development Department, Rajasthan who can contribute to the family income while working from home. Now women of the state will be able to get employment sitting at home through this scheme. Many women cannot go out and work, the government wants to help them by giving them work at home so that they can work at home and earn money to support their families financially.
benefits: Advertisement of such private unit which provides work from home-job work to a maximum number of women will be displayed free of cost on the Work from Home-Job Work portal.

If a private unit provides work from home - job work to women and the payment for the work given to the woman is more than ₹ 5,000, then ₹ 3,000 per trainee will be given as a training incentive, as a training fee.
eligibility: The applicant must be a resident of Rajasthan.
The minimum age of the applicant should be 18 years.
Preference will be given to widow/abandoned/divorced/disabled/victim of violence.
documents_required: Special Category (Disabled/Divorced/Specially Handicapped/Victim of Violence) Documents

faqs.question: What is the Mukhyamantri Work from Home - Job Work Yojana?
faqs.answer: The Mukhyamantri Work from Home - Job Work Yojana is a government initiative aimed at providing work-from-home opportunities to individuals seeking employment or supplemental income.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of “Mukhyamantri Work from Home-Job Work Scheme”?
faqs.answer: With this scheme, women of the state will become empowered and self-reliant. Rajasthan Work from Home Scheme will also reduce the unemployment rate. Apart from this, women will also be able to get employment under this scheme. Various training programs will also be organized for this.

faqs.question: Is there any Preference that will be given in this scheme?
faqs.answer: Preference will be given to widow/abandoned/divorced/disabled/victim of violence.

faqs.question: Is there any age criteria?
faqs.answer: The minimum age of the applicant should be 18 years.

faqs.question: Can I apply offline for the scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, you can apply online only.

faqs.question: Can applicants from outside Rajasthan apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme is only for Rajasthan state.
